name: Kity Builder
description:
Are you ready to go to a dreamlike island? Kity needs your help to build a big city! They lost the blueprints and needs to find them to start making all the new city buildings.  Explore the island and customize the city as you wish!

Controls

WASD - Move Kity

Space bar - Jump / Use Inventory item

Hold shift - Open Inventory

Arrow keys - Rotate camera (Left/Right) and Navigate Inventory (Up/Down)

Credits

Made by Yeray Toledano, Sambero, irx99

Music by Groovel Studio

Special thanks to 

Made in ~42 hours for the ZJam 2021
